caption.p:
Effects of treatments on the relative uterine wet weight. SHAM: sham-operated animals; OVX: ovariectomized animals; E 2V: estradiol valerate; TAM: tamoxifen; AE: aqueous extract of D. edulis leaves. Data are presented as mean ± S.E.M. ( n = 6).
∗
p < 0.05 and
∗∗∗
p < 0.001 compared with SHAM; # p < 0.05, ## p < 0.01, and ### p < 0.001 compared with OVX; and
a
p < 0.05,
b
p < 0.01, and
c
p < 0.001 compared with OVX + E 2V.
